title: FIZZU Soda
tagline: Bold, unexpected flavours brought to life through playful, graphic packaging that stands out on shelf

overview.title: What's in the Can
overview.description: FIZZU is a concept soda brand designed for the adventurous, featuring bold, graphic packaging and unexpected flavour combinations. The project explores how playful design can create shelf impact and communicate a sense of fun.

problem.title: The Shelf Problem
problem.description: Most soda packaging relies on conventional colour schemes and predictable flavours. The challenge was to break the mold and create a visual identity that instantly signals something new and exciting.

objectives: Create shelf impact with bold graphics

solution.title: What Came Out of the Can
solution.description: Three unique can designs were created, each with a distinct colour palette and graphic motif to represent its flavour. The packaging system is flexible, allowing for future flavour additions.

styleGuide.title: Brand DNA
styleGuide.description: A flexible system of colours, shapes, and typography ensures brand consistency across future flavours and packaging formats.

outcomes.title: What This Project Shows
outcomes.description: FIZZU stands out on shelf and communicates a sense of fun and adventure. The project demonstrates how bold design can drive brand differentiation in a crowded market.
